StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: You notice a cute girl out of the corner of your eye. She is wearing a skimpy tube top and tight cotton shorts. She has glow sticks attached to her in various places, giving her a distinct look as she dances to the blaring music. On her head is a cat ear head band and a clip on tail is attached to the back of her shorts. Clearly this party girl has a cat girl fetish.....which gives you wicked ideas on how to grant her wish.
StaticSkill.Description: Need a pick-me-up? Need something to really get you moving and grooving? Need something to turn you into a sexy party-going cat girl!? Then look no further~
